news.title: 特朗普威胁阻挠美加新桥开通
news.title0: Trump threatens to block opening of US-Canada bridge
news.content: 特朗普要求加拿大分享一座连接两国的新桥的所有权和管理权，否则将阻止其开通。
news.content0: The White House has demanded that Canada "share authority" and ownership of a new bridge connecting the two countries after a "clear and direct" call between Donald Trump and Prime Minister Mark Carney.
news.author: BBC

news.title: 加拿大矿业公司员工在墨西哥遇害
news.title0: Canadian mining firm says its abducted workers found dead in Mexico
news.content: 加拿大Vizsla Silver公司证实，上月于墨西哥项目现场被绑架的部分员工已遇害。
news.content0: A Canadian mining company says some of its workers who were abducted from a project site in Mexico last month have been found dead.
news.author: BBC

news.title: 索马里客机故障迫降海岸全员生还
news.title0: Pilot praised after crash-landing faulty Somali passenger plane on seashore
news.content: 索马里一架载有55人的客机因技术故障紧急迫降在首都机场附近海岸，机上人员全部安全撤离。
news.content0: An airline in Somalia has praised one of its pilots after he crash-landed his passenger plane, which had suffered a technical fault, on the shoreline next to the capital's international airport with all 55 on board surviving.
news.author: BBC

news.title: 美国移民高官国会听证为政策辩护
news.title0: Immigration bosses defend agents after the killing of two US citizens
news.content: 美国移民和海关执法局及海关与边境保护局负责人在国会听证会上，为特朗普的移民政策及近期行动辩护。
news.content0: President Donald Trump's top officials have declined to comment on the killing of two US citizens, while forcefully defending the president's immigration agenda during a tense congressional hearing.
news.author: BBC

news.title: 美国少女起诉社媒成瘾案开庭
news.title0: Lawyers argue that Instagram and YouTube intentionally addicted and harmed teen in landmark social media trial
news.content: 美国一女子起诉Meta和YouTube，指控其平台成瘾性设计导致其心理健康受损，此案为首批同类诉讼之一。
news.content0: Lawyers for a now-20-year-old woman argued that addictive features harmed her mental health as opening statements began Monday in a landmark trial against Meta and YouTube, the first of hundreds of similar cases to go to trial.
news.author: CNN

news.title: 俄军逼近夺取乌克兰三处战略要地
news.title0: Russia Nears Capture of Key Ukrainian Towns After Year of Grinding Assaults
news.content: 经过一年鏖战，俄军即将完成对乌克兰东南部和东北部三处战略城镇的占领，以建立未来攻势的据点。
news.content0: For over a year, Russian forces have slogged through battlefields in Ukraine without seizing a single urban stronghold.
news.author: NYTimes

news.title: 墨西哥称缴获卡特尔弹药半数来自美国兵工厂
news.title0: Cartel’s Seized Ammunition Is Traced to U.S. Army Plant, Mexico Says
news.content: 墨西哥国防部长称，自2012年以来缴获的卡特尔大口径弹药中，约47%可追溯至美国密苏里州的政府兵工厂。
news.content0: About half of the high-powered .50-caliber cartridges that the Mexican authorities have seized from cartels since 2012 were traced to an ammunition factory outside Kansas City, Mo., that is owned by the United States government, Mexico’s defense secretary said on Tuesday.
news.author: NYTimes

news.title: 俄罗斯进一步限制Telegram服务
news.title0: Russia Further Restricts Telegram, Escalating Internet Clampdown
news.content: 俄罗斯通信监管机构周二收紧了对即时通讯应用Telegram的限制，进一步打压国内互联网自由。
news.content0: Russia on Tuesday tightened its step-by-step throttling of the ubiquitous communication app Telegram, escalatinga crackdownon what remains of the free Russian internet amid President Vladimir V. Putin’s war against Ukraine.
news.author: NYTimes

news.title: 挪威冬奥选手赛后直播承认出轨
news.title0: Olympian Sturla Holm Laegreid admits to cheating on girlfriend after medal win
news.content: 挪威冬季两项选手莱格雷德在赢得铜牌后，于电视直播中情绪崩溃，承认对女友不忠。
news.content0: Norwegian Olympian Sturla Holm Laegreid confessed in a live television interview to cheating on his girlfriend, moments after winning a bronze medal.
news.author: Sky News
